data.text: Da Awurade ase na da ne kɛseyɛ adi.
Monto dwom mma no, monto ayeyi dwom mma no;
Monhoahoa mo ho wɔ ne din kronkron mu;
Momma mo ani nna Awurade ne nʼahoɔden no so;
Monkae anwonwade a wayɛ
Abraham mma, Onyankopɔn asomfo,
Ɔyɛ Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn.
Ɔkae nʼapam daa nyinaa,
apam a ɔne Abraham yɛe no,
Ɔhyɛɛ mu den maa Yakob sɛ mmara,
Ɔkae se, “Mede Kanaan asase no bɛma wo
Ɔkaa eyi bere a na wɔnnɔɔso,
Wofii aman so kɔɔ aman so;
Wamma obi anhyɛ wɔn so;
“Mommfa mo nsa nka wɔn a masra wɔn ngo;
Ɔmaa ɔkɔm baa asase no so
na ɔsomaa ɔbarima bi dii wɔn anim,
Wɔde mpokyerɛ guu ne nʼanan,
kosii sɛ nea ɔhyɛɛ ho nkɔm no baa mu,
Ɔhene no soma ma wokoyii no;
Ɔyɛɛ no ne fi so wura
sɛ ɔnkyerɛ ne mmapɔmma nea ɔpɛ
Na Israel kɔɔ Misraim;
Awurade maa ne nkurɔfo ase dɔe;
wɔn a ɔdan wɔn koma sɛ wɔntan ne nkurɔfo
Ɔsomaa ne somfo Mose,
Wɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnne nwonwaso wɔ wɔn mu,
Ɔsomaa sum, na ɔmaa asase duruu sum,
Ɔmaa wɔn nsu nyinaa dan mogya,
Mpɔtorɔ bɛhyɛɛ asase no so ma,
Ɔkasae, na nwansena bebree
Ɔmaa wɔn osu dan mparuwbo
Ɔsɛee wɔn bobe ne borɔdɔma nnua
Ɔkasae, na mmoadabi bae,
wɔwee ahabammono biara a ɛwɔ wɔn asase no so,
Afei okunkum wɔn asase so mmakan nyinaa,
Oyii Israel a ɔso dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ
Misraim ani gyei, bere a wɔkɔe,
Ɔtrɛw omununkum mu kataa wɔn so,
Wobisae, na ɔbrɛɛ wɔn mparuwbo
Obuee ɔbotan mu maa nsu fii mu bae;
Ɔkaee ne bɔ kronkron bi a
Oyii ne nkurɔfo maa wɔn ani gyei;
ɔde amanaman no nsase maa wɔn,
na wɔahwɛ nʼahyɛde
